verses.verse: For all this I <S%H5414>laid<s%> to my <S%H3820>heart<s%>, even to <S%H952>explore<s%> all <S%H6662>this<s%>: that the righteous, and the <S%H2450>wise<s%>, and their <S%H5652>works<s%>, are in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>; whether it be <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H1571>or<s%> <S%H8135>hatred<s%>, <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> it <S%H6440>not<s%>; all is before them.

All things come alike to <S%H259>all<s%>: there is one <S%H4745>event<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; to the <S%H2896>good<s%> and to the <S%H2889>clean<s%> and to the <S%H2931>unclean<s%>; to him that <S%H2076>sacrificeth<s%> and to him <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificeth<s%> <S%H2896>not<s%>; as is the good, so is the <S%H2398>sinner<s%>; and he that <S%H7650>sweareth<s%>, as he that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> an <S%H7621>oath<s%>.

This is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> in all that is <S%H6213>done<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, that there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4745>event<s%> unto <S%H3820>all<s%>: yea also, the heart of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H1947>madness<s%> is in their <S%H3824>heart<s%> while they <S%H2416>live<s%>, and <S%H310>after<s%> that they go to the <S%H4191>dead<s%>.

For <S%H4310><s%> to him that <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H2266>joined<s%> with all the <S%H2416>living<s%> there is <S%H986>hope<s%>; for a <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3611>dog<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H738>lion<s%>.

For the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that they shall <S%H4191>die<s%>: but the <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> not <S%H3972>anything<s%>, neither have they any more a <S%H7939>reward<s%>; for the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of them is <S%H7911>forgotten<s%>.

As well their <S%H160>love<s%>, as their <S%H8135>hatred<s%> and their <S%H7068>envy<s%>, is <S%H6>perished<s%> long <S%H3528>ago<s%>; neither have they any more a <S%H2506>portion<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> in anything that is <S%H6213>done<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%>.

Go thy <S%H3212>way<s%>, <S%H398>eat<s%> thy <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H8057>joy<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> thy <S%H3196>wine<s%> with a <S%H2896>merry<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>; for <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H3528>already<s%> <S%H7521>accepted<s%> thy <S%H4639>works<s%>.
Let thy <S%H899>garments<s%> be <S%H6256>always<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>; and let not thy <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H2637>lack<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

Live <S%H2416><s%> <S%H7200>joyfully<s%> with the <S%H802>wife<s%> whom thou <S%H157>lovest<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H1892>vanity<s%>, which he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> thee under the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, all thy <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1892>vanity<s%>: for that is thy <S%H2506>portion<s%> in <S%H2416>life<s%>, and in thy <S%H5999>labor<s%> wherein thou <S%H6001>laborest<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%>.

Whatsoever thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4672>findeth<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%>, <S%H6213>do<s%> it with thy <S%H3581>might<s%>; for there is no <S%H4639>work<s%>, nor <S%H2808>device<s%>, nor <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, nor <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, in <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>, whither thou <S%H1980>goest<s%>.

I <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, that the <S%H4793>race<s%> is not to the <S%H7031>swift<s%>, nor the <S%H4421>battle<s%> to the <S%H1368>strong<s%>, neither yet <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H2450>wise<s%>, nor yet <S%H6239>riches<s%> to men of <S%H995>understanding<s%>, nor yet <S%H2580>favor<s%> to men of <S%H3045>skill<s%>; but <S%H6256>time<s%> and <S%H6294>chance<s%> happeneth to them <S%H7136>all<s%>.

For <S%H120>man<s%> also <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> not his <S%H6256>time<s%>: as the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> that are <S%H270>taken<s%> in an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4685>net<s%>, and as the <S%H6833>birds<s%> that are <S%H270>caught<s%> in the <S%H6341>snare<s%>, even <S%H1992>so<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H3369>snared<s%> in an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%>, when it <S%H5307>falleth<s%> suddenly upon <S%H6597>them<s%>.
I have also <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%> on <S%H2090>this<s%> <S%H1419>wise<s%>, and it seemed great unto me:

There was a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> within <S%H935>it<s%>; and there came a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> against <S%H5437>it<s%>, and besieged <S%H1129>it<s%>, and built <S%H1419>great<s%> bulwarks against <S%H4685>it<s%>.

Now there was <S%H4672>found<s%> in it a <S%H4542>poor<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, and he by his <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H4422>delivered<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>; yet no <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> that same <S%H4542>poor<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2451>I<s%>, Wisdom is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H1369>strength<s%>: nevertheless the poor <S%H4542>man<s%>'s <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H959>despised<s%>, and his <S%H1697>words<s%> are not <S%H8085>heard<s%>.
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H5183>quiet<s%> are better than the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of him that <S%H4910>ruleth<s%> among <S%H3684>fools<s%>.
